mapper.sql: ID as id, USER_NAME as userName, USER_NBR as userNbr, INTERFACE_CODE as interfaceCode, INTERFACE_NAME as interfaceName, REQUEST_PARAM as requestParam, RESPONSE_RESULT as responseResult, FK_DATE as fkDate
mapper.insert: insert into RM_USER_LOGS_INFO ( USER_NAME, USER_NBR, INTERFACE_CODE, INTERFACE_NAME, REQUEST_PARAM, RESPONSE_RESULT, FK_DATE ) values(#{userName},#{userNbr},#{interfaceCode},#{interfaceName}, #{requestParam},#{responseResult},#{fkDate})
mapper.select:
select
from RM_USER_LOGS_INFO where 1=1
AND USER_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{userName},'%')
order by FK_DATE desc limit #{page},#{size}
